analysis.description:
Reentrancy in StrikeCoinCrowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#505-538):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(bonusWallet,bonusTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#514-516)
	- token.mint(bonusWallet,preICOTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#522)
	- issuedTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#523-524)
	- token.mint(restrictedWallet,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#531)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensGranted (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#532-533)

StrikeCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#465-494) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#491)

StrikeCoinCrowdsale.grantTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#494-503) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,stcTokenCount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#502)

StrikeCoinCrowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#505-538) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(bonusWallet,bonusTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#514-516)
	-token.mint(bonusWallet,preICOTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#522)
	-token.mint(restrictedWallet,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#531)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol#535)

StrikeCoinCrowdsale.pauseTrading (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.pause() (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol)

StrikeCoinCrowdsale.startTrading (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.unpause() (/unique_chucks/6/0x8d040556214125f3fe7d8b22cf17c364603a6035.sol)
